creator: McPhillips, Henry Thomas, 1850-1913. (author)
description: McPhillips, Henry Thomas: 1850-1913. To the West, 1881; published a paper in Winnipeg for a few years, then moved to Prince Albert; for a time held a position in the Department of Inland Revenue stationed in NWT; spent many years in USA; at the time of his death was publishing a local paper in western Canada. // Running title: "Saskatchewan directory." Cover title: "McPhillips' Saskatchewan directory." Printed in Qu'Appelle at "The Progress" Book and Job Office. Pagination includes advertising. An invaluable source of information about settlements in the Saskatchewan Valley.
subject: The People--Biography

title: McPhillips' alphabetical and business directory of the district of Saskatchewan, N.W.T.: Together with brief historical sketches of Prince Albert, Battleford and the other settlements in the district, 1888
